code:
let localDatabase=[];// Fetch users from local storage
export const fetchUsersFromLocalDb=()=>{const storedData=localStorage.getItem("localDatabase");localDatabase=storedData?JSON.parse(storedData):[];return localDatabase;};// Save user to local storage
export const saveUserToLocalDb=user=>{localDatabase.push(user);localStorage.setItem("localDatabase",JSON.stringify(localDatabase));};// Delete user from local storage
export const deleteUserFromLocalDb=userId=>{localDatabase=localDatabase.filter(user=>user._id!==userId);localStorage.setItem("localDatabase",JSON.stringify(localDatabase));};// Add other local database functions as needed
